com.paymill.services
Class TransactionService

java.lang.Object
  com.paymill.services.TransactionService

public class TransactionService
extends Object

The TransactionService is used to list, create, edit and update PAYMILL Transactions.

Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Vassil Nikolov

Method Detail

list

public PaymillList<Transaction> list()
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Transaction objects.

Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Transactions and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Transaction> list(Integer count,
                                     Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Transaction objects, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Transactions and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Transaction> list(Transaction.Filter filter,
                                     Transaction.Order order)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Transaction objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied.

Parameters:
filter - Transaction.Filter or null
order - Transaction.Order or null
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Transactions and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Transaction> list(Transaction.Filter filter,
                                     Transaction.Order order,
                                     Integer count,
                                     Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Transaction objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
filter - Transaction.Filter or null
order - Transaction.Order or null
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Transactions and their total count.

get

public Transaction get(Transaction transaction)
This function refresh and returns the detailed information of the concrete requested Transaction.

Parameters:
transaction - A Transaction with Id.
Returns:
Refreshed instance of the given Transaction.

get

public Transaction get(String transactionId)
This function refresh and returns the detailed information of the concrete requested Transaction.

Parameters:
transaction - The Id of an existing Transaction.
Returns:
Refreshed instance of the given Transaction.

createWithToken

public Transaction createWithToken(String token,
                                   Integer amount,
                                   String currency)
Executes a Transaction with token for the given amount in the given currency.

Parameters:
token - Token generated by PAYMILL Bridge, which represents a credit card or direct debit.
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
Returns:
Transaction object indicating whether a the call was successful or not.

createWithToken

public Transaction createWithToken(String token,
                                   Integer amount,
                                   String currency,
                                   String description)
Executes a Transaction with token for the given amount in the given currency.

Parameters:
token - Token generated by PAYMILL Bridge, which represents a credit card or direct debit.
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
description - A short description for the transaction.
Returns:
Transaction object indicating whether a the call was successful or not.

Parameters:

fee - A Fee.

createWithPaymentAndClient

public Transaction createWithPaymentAndClient(Payment payment,
                                              Client client,
                                              Integer amount,
                                              String currency)
Executes a Transaction with Payment for the given amount in the given currency.

Parameters:
payment - A PAYMILL Payment representing credit card or direct debit.
client - The PAYMILL Client which have to be charged.
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
Returns:
Transaction object indicating whether a the call was successful or not.

createWithPreauthorization

public Transaction createWithPreauthorization(Preauthorization preauthorization,
                                              Integer amount,
                                              String currency)
Executes a Transaction with Preauthorization for the given amount in the given currency.

Parameters:
preauthorization - A Preauthorization, which has reserved some money from the clients credit card.
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
Returns:
Transaction object indicating whether a the call was successful or not.
